sources.title: How Awful About Allan 1970 | Anthony Perkins | Psychological Thriller | Full Movie | Subtitled
sources.description:
Allan, Wouldn't You Be Better Off Dead?
After an eight-month stay in a mental hospital & a tragic fire accident, a tormented man returns home to live with his sister: and he discovers sinister changes, and unravels a disturbing mystery surrounding a housemate.

Original title: How Awful About Allan (1970)

Director: Curtis Harrington
Writer: Henry Farrell 
Stars: Anthony Perkins, Julie Harris, Joan Hackett  
Genre: Thriller, Drama, Horror, Mystery & Suspense, Made for TV
